Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE
Name: Pitcher
Description: Pitcher with narrow mouth, moulded rim and short and narrow neck with slightly concave walls. Globular body and stable base with ring-shaped foot. Ribbon handle starting at the top of the bottleneck and ending at the top of the body. Paste of an orangey colour. Surface covered with reddish coating, partially lost.
